ygData.subject: Re: approaching Research..
ygData.msgSnippet: You can only learn the basics at level 16, one training point.  Each spell level (4 player levels) after that you can train more points. I m not sure what the
ygData.messageBody:
You can only learn the basics at level 16, one training point. Each
spell level (4 player levels) after that you can train more points.
I'm not sure what the limit is. I suggest that you get someone higher
level than you to make you required spells then collect more pages for
your own practice.


--- jcent@... wrote:
> From: jcent@...
>
>
> As I am about to reach my 16th rank....I am
> anxiously preparing for
> Research....
>
> How many training points are recommended before I
> start combining pages?
> And what is the maximum you can train to in the
> Guild? I have both sides
> of Tasharins page 23...and I don't want to fail my
> first research
> attempt...as they were not easy to acquire.
>
> Any advice will be appreciated.
>
> Fistelbane, High Elf Enchanter, Rathe Server
